name: Reap and Slash
description:
A hack and slash game made for the Mini Jam 92: Death.

I didn't make a tutorial for this one, but its pretty simple to play. The controls are:

AJumpS
AttackDDashArrow keysMove

Basically, the character is invulnerable during the dash. Also, if the player holds the Jump button, the character will float in the air.
